description:
This DLC is playable in Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival game modes like Taiko Mode and Great Drum Toy War.

Includes:
Song: Crime and Punishment - Those who are unwilling to pray / YOKO TAKAHASHI
Easy★3 Normal★5 Hard★6 Extreme★7
Mini Characters: Godzilla, Evangelion Unit-01, Ultraman, Masked Rider
*Mini Characters can be used in My Room -> Outfits -> Mini Characters

Additionally, an exclusive background with Shin Japan Heroes Universe characters will be shown in 1-Player Taiko Mode when playing the song Crime and Punishment - Those who are unwilling to pray.

*This product is not compatible with Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum'n'Fun!
*This product is not available for online modes.
*The Mini Characters included in this product are not available for online modes.
*An internet connection and a Nintendo Account is necessary for use. A Nintendo Switch™ Online membership is not required.
name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival Shin Japan Heroes Universe Pack
